name: Norton LiveUpdate Log File
summary: Learn about .LUE files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: LUE log files are generated automatically and are saved within the \​Norton\​Lue\​Logs\​ directory by default. Log.Lue is the primary log file, while TempLog.Lue saves temporary log data. A Download.Resumption.Lue file may also be created in the \​Norton\​Lue\​Downloads\​ directory when files are partially downloaded.

description: Log file created by Norton LiveUpdate, a program that downloads and installs security updates for Symantec software; keeps track of virus definitions and other updates that have been installed.
